statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, current_stock_quantity FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY current_stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, last_replenishment_date FROM inventory_tracking WHERE replenishment_lead_time < 5;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE minimum_stock_quantity < current_stock_quantity;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock_quantity < minimum_stock_quantity ORDER BY last_replenishment_date DESC
SELECT product_name, current_stock_quantity FROM inventory_tracking WHERE product_id = 3
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE minimum_stock_quantity < 50
SELECT product_name FROM inventory_tracking WHERE last_replenishment_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_replenishment_date
SELECT product_id, current_stock_quantity FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock_quantity > minimum_stock_quantity AND replenishment_lead_time < 5 ORDER BY current_stock_quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock > 50;
SELECT product_id, optimal_stock FROM inventory WHERE optimal_stock < 100;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT SUM(current_stock) AS total_stock FROM inventory;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE current_stock > optimal_stock
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE current_stock <= optimal_stock ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT product_name, current_stock, optimal_stock FROM inventory JOIN orders ON inventory.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' AND quantity > 10
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory JOIN orders ON inventory.product_id = orders.product_id GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 100
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock < 10;
SELECT product_name, last_replenishment_date FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY last_replenishment_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT alert_id, alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM stockout_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock < 10;
SELECT product_name, last_replenishment_date FROM inventory_tracking WHERE last_replenishment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT i.product_name, r.reorder_quantity FROM inventory_tracking i JOIN replenishment_strategies r ON i.product_id = r.product_id;
SELECT i.product_name, sa.alert_message FROM inventory_tracking i LEFT JOIN stockout_alerts sa ON i.product_id = sa.product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock < safety_stock;
SELECT id, product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock > 100 ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT product_id, order_quantity, order_status, order_time FROM replenishment_orders WHERE order_status = 'pending' ORDER BY order_time ASC;
SELECT id, product_id, previous_stock, new_stock, replenishment_date FROM replenishment_history WHERE replenishment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock < safety_stock;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, safety_stock FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock < safety_stock ORDER BY safety_stock ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, safety_stock, replenishment_lead_time FROM inventory_tracking WHERE replenishment_lead_time > 2;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, safety_stock, replenishment_lead_time FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock > 10 AND safety_stock < 5;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT warehouse_id, location FROM warehouses ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT stockout_date, product_id FROM stockouts WHERE stockout_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 100.00;
SELECT stockout_id, product_id, stockout_date FROM stockouts ORDER BY stockout_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT warehouse_id, location, capacity FROM warehouses WHERE capacity >= 1000;
